Welcome to Paint Outlet
settings.sub_title: WE’RE REVOLUTIONIZING THE PAINT & DECORATING INDUSTRY

settings.title: Quality
settings.text: We have upmost quality control. Every product is scientifically tested and guaranteed to meet all quality expectations

settings.title: Price
settings.text: We cut out the middlemen, saving up to 50% on the usual costs. We pass these savings on to our customers while giving peace of mind to our customers regarding product quality.

settings.title: Eco-world
settings.text: We’re contributing to the well-being of the environment. Our practices lead to significant savings in the world's resources and contribute to a healthier planet.

settings.title: With 25 years of experience
settings.text: By manufacturing the paint ourselves, we have achieved three major breakthroughs in the industry

settings.title: Choose High-Graded Products
settings.text: Browse our wide range of high-quality decorating products, including the trendiest colours, without breaking the bank. We offer unlimited quantities to suit your needs.

settings.title: 30 Years' Experience. Fresh-made to Order
settings.text: With over 30 years of experience, we manufacture our products in-house with complete quality control from start to finish. Our focus on high quality and environmental standards ensures that your purchase is the best it can be.

settings.title: Premium, Fast, Tracked 24-48H UK Shipping
settings.text: Enjoy premium, tracked shipping for your order, ensuring that it arrives quickly and safely. All UK orders over £50 qualify for free shipping, making it even more convenient for you.

settings.title: Break the False Economy, Be the Change
settings.text: By choosing Paint Outlet, you are breaking the cycle of cheap, low-quality paint and contributing to a more sustainable future. Join us in creating a brighter and better tomorrow.

settings.title: Your product is in good hands
settings.text: By manufacturing the paint ourselves, we have achieved three major breakthroughs in the industry

settings.title: We’re revolutionising the decorating industry with higher quality products at a lower cost, while striving to eliminate paint waste.
An estimated 415 million litres of paint are generated in the USA and UK every year. Only 2% of this is recycled. The other 98%? It goes straight to landfill. How can this be?
Our Vision of the Paint Industry

settings.text: We understand how important it is finding the right product, so whether you're a business or a first time painter, We've made the best possible product finder to find the right product.
